entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
